text: The Governor's Daughter is a 1910 American silent drama movie.THE GOVERNOR'S DAUGHTER It stars Anna Rosemond and Frank H. Crane. ==Plot== The movie is about a convict named Bill Raymond who goes to prison for a long time and a girl who rides with him on the train and takes pity on him. ==References== Category:1910 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies
title: The Governor's Daughter
